ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Van Allen Probe B PSBR Relativistic Proton Spectrometer Level 2 1 minute Data
ResourceHeader.Description: RBSP-B Proton Spectrometer Belt Research - Relativistic Proton Spectrometer (PSBR-RPS) Energies from ~60 MeV to ~2 GeV
